text: "Djibouti" (, , ) is the national anthem of Djibouti. ==Lyrics== ===Somali and Afar lyrics=== Somali lyrics Somali IPA transcription Afar lyrics Afar IPA transcription ===Translations=== Poetic English translation Poetic French translation Poetic Arabic translation Arise with strength! For we have raised our flag, The flag which has cost us dear ğ„† With extremes of thirst and pain. ğ„‡ Our flag, whose colours are the everlasting green of the earth, The blue of the sky, and white, the colour of peace; And in the centre the red star of blood. ğ„† Oh flag of ours, what a glorious sight! Oh flag of ours, what a glorious sight! ğ„‡ LÃ¨ve-toi avec force! title: Djibouti (anthem)
